name: Ulrich
description:
Find new friends in a struggle against a common enemy. Join a group of Vampires with a broken circadian rhythm and beat all obstacles to achieve your goals.

Web build could be buggy on mac or non-chrome based browsers, in that case download a build for your OS please. It has also benefit of better performance ;)

Go Left: ................................. Left / A
Go Right: .............................. Right / D
Jump: ........................................... Space
Dash: ............................................ C / RMB
Interact: ..................................... X / LMB
Look Up: ................................... Up / W
Look Down: ........................ Down / S
Reload Checkpoint: ...................... R
Pause: ............................................ Esc

Controllers should work too!
Use D-pad to move and A to jump, X to interact and RT to dash.

This game was made during Metroidvania Month 19.
